author: andyj
msg: Add 3.2 placeholders ... but then if this release gets renamed to 4.0 then these files need renaming.

author: stsp
msg: mod_ssl: Check for RAND_egd() at configure time and only use it if present.
Fixes the build with LibreSSL which does not provide this function.
Submitted by: Bernard Spil <pil.oss gmail com>, stsp

author: brane
msg: In JavaHL, use a standard smart pointer to control the status editor proxy
instead of relying on manual cleanup.
(RemoteSession::status): Use the new typedef instead of std:auto_ptr.
(StateReporter): Use the new typedef instead of a raw pointer.

msg: Adding new SQL info in 1.3.1 release notes
